title: JSONBlog
description: A JSON-based static blog generator with TypeScript monorepo architecture. Features Turborepo, pnpm workspaces, and dual ESM/CJS builds.

title: Neural Search Engine
description: Semantic search powered by embeddings and vector databases.

title: LLM Eval Framework
description: Automated evaluation framework for testing LLM outputs at scale.

title: Agent Toolkit
description: Reusable components for building agentic systems with tool use.
